  • Theorems for Free for Free: Parametricity, With and Without Types.
    Amal Ahmed, Dustin Jamner, Jeremy Siek, and Philip Wadler.
    In 22nd ACM SIGPLAN International Conference on Functional Programming (ICFP ’17), Oxford, UK, September 2017.

  • FunTAL: Reasonably Mixing a Functional Language with Assembly.
    Daniel Patterson, Jamie Perconti, Christos Dimoulas, and Amal Ahmed. In ACM SIGPLAN Conference on Programming Language Design and Implementation (PLDI ’17), Barcelona, Spain, June 2017.
    Technical appendix, April 2017.

SILC is part of the Programming Research Laboratory at Northeastern University.
